name: elsciRL

properties.name: cite
properties.value: {{\"generate a BibTex for the page with a short citekey and give just the citekey\"}}

properties.name: authors
properties.value: {{\"get a list of authors from {selector:.author}} in the format: author1,author2,...\"}}

properties.name: publisher
properties.value: {{\"get the name of the publisher, if not clearly stated then the base url name without .co or .com\"}}

properties.name: site
properties.value: {{\"get the base url name without .co or .com\"}}

properties.name: published
properties.value: {{\"get the publsihed date of the page in dd/mm/yyyy\"}}

properties.name: year
properties.value: {{\"get the publsihed year of the page in yyyy\"}}

properties.name: description
properties.value: {{\"generate a summary in less than 100 characters\"}}

properties.name: tags
properties.value: {{\"generate a set of tags with no spaces for the page\"}}

properties.name: type
properties.value: {{\"select the type of article from: 'WebArticle', 'ArXiv', 'Conference Paper', 'Journal Paper','Book' or 'Video'\"}}

properties.name: BibTeX (AI Generated)
properties.value: {{\"generate a BibTeX reference for the page without special characters and a short citekey\"}}
